definitions.definition: Consisting of flakes or of small, loose masses ; lying, or cleaving off, in flakes or layers ; flakelike.
Unreliable ; likely to make plans with others but then abandon those plans.
Unreliable ; working only on an intermittent basis; likely due to malfunction.
examples: I cannot enjoy the online game because of my flaky Internet connection.

main_definition: Consisting of flakes or of small, loose masses ; lying, or cleaving off, in flakes or layers ; flakelike.
secondary_definitions: ( informal , of a person ) Unreliable ; likely to make plans with others but then abandon those plans.
( informal , of a thing ) Unreliable ; working only on an intermittent basis; likely due to malfunction.
